snippet: The son of Larry Ellison, founder of Oracle, shifts from investing in films to steering them creatively, with ‘Genisys’ and the coming addition to the ‘Mission: Impossible’ franchise.
abstract: Movie producer David Ellison has shifted from merely funding films through his company Skydance Media to taking on role of full-fledged producer for films Terminator Genisys and upcoming Mission: Impossible--Rogue Nation; Terminator Genisys has received relatively tepid reaction, but Ellison, who is son of Oracle founder Larry Ellison, has impressed many in industry with his business savvy and vision.
lead_paragraph: The son of Larry Ellison, founder of Oracle, shifts from investing in films to steering them creatively, with ‘Genisys’ and the coming addition to the ‘Mission: Impossible’ franchise.

headline.main: With ‘Terminator Genisys,’ David Ellison Stops Playing It Safe
headline.print_headline: A Producer Branches Out With ‘Terminator Genisys’
